questions.name: Alex Trebek
questions.content: Her recording career lasted just eight years, starting in 1955 with A Church, A Courtroom And Then Good-Bye.

questions.name: Alex Trebek
questions.content: Other than Q, these two letters appear the least in the names of states, each appearing only once.

questions.name: Alex Trebek
questions.content: One of the top 20, this 1946 film was based on a short story published as The Man Who Was Never Born.
